sentences.en: Circumstances dictated that they played a defensive rather than attacking game.
sentences.cn: 比赛形势决定了他们要打防守战而不是进攻战。

sentences.en: Don't play games with me.
sentences.cn: 别跟我插科打诨的！。

sentences.en: Eric Cantona made the game safe with a brilliant opportunist goal.
sentences.cn: 埃里克·坎通纳抓住机会踢进绝妙的一球，锁定了比赛的胜局。

sentences.en: Family values are suddenly the name of the game.
sentences.cn: 家庭价值观突然变得重要起来。

sentences.en: game birds
sentences.cn: 被捕猎的鸟

sentences.en: He finally faltered in the last game of a heroic match.
sentences.cn: 他在这场艰苦比赛的最后一局中踉跄结束。

sentences.en: He said he's game for a similar challenge next year.
sentences.cn: 他说他明年还愿意接受类似的挑战。

sentences.en: I think Krishnan excelled himself in all departments of his game.
sentences.cn: 我认为克里舍南在比赛的各个环节都有超常的发挥。

sentences.en: If the weather relents, the game will be finished today.
sentences.cn: 如果天气转好的话，比赛将在今天结束。

sentences.en: In a warm-up game for the World Cup, Uruguay have beaten England.
sentences.cn: 在世界杯热身赛中，乌拉圭队打败了英格兰队。

sentences.en: It was the first game of the season.
sentences.cn: 那是本赛季的第一场比赛。

sentences.en: It's a game that has really lost its allure.
sentences.cn: 这是一项的确已失去了魅力的游戏。

sentences.en: Kernaghan missed the United game after he ricked his neck.
sentences.cn: 克纳汉因为扭伤脖子而错过了联赛。

sentences.en: That programme will include live commentary on the England-Ireland game.
sentences.cn: 那个节目将包括英格兰与爱尔兰比赛的实况报道。

sentences.en: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.cn: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.en: The faces of the two conspirators gave the game away.
sentences.cn: 这两个共谋者的表情泄漏了秘密。

sentences.en: The Georgian, aged 19, is not one of the game's big hitters.
sentences.cn: 这位19岁的佐治亚州人并不是比赛中的优秀击球手之一。

sentences.en: The Red Sox lost the pennant to Detroit by a single game.
sentences.cn: 红袜队以一场之差将冠军输给了底特律队。

sentences.en: the strongest aspect of his game
sentences.cn: 他比赛技巧中最强的一面

sentences.en: to what extent are they playing the government's game?.
sentences.cn: 他们支持政府会支持到什么程度？。

sentences.en: We decided that in the game we would be physical and aggressive.
sentences.cn: 我们决定在比赛中积极拼抢，大胆进攻。

sentences.en: what are you up to?.
sentences.cn: 你在干什么？。

trans.tran_en: If you are game for something, you are willing to do something new, unusual, or risky

trans.tran_cn: 游戏，运动，比赛，竞赛，诡计，猎物

a children’s activity in which they play with toys, pretend to be someone else etc
to play games of chance for money, stakes, etc; gamble
